legal_source: Ill. Admin. Code tit. 68, ยง 1410.200 - Standards of Practice

key_definitions.inspect: Visual examination of readily accessible systems using normal operating controls and opening readily accessible panels. NO dismantling, NO destructive measures, NO risk to persons or property.
key_definitions.readily_accessible: Available for visual inspection WITHOUT moving personal property, dismantling, destructive measures, or risk to persons or property.
key_definitions.dismantle: To take apart or remove any component that would not be taken apart by a homeowner in normal routine maintenance.

not_required_to: Determine condition of components NOT readily accessible
Operate systems that are shut down or don't turn on with normal controls
Enter or access areas that may be unsafe or not readily accessible
Offer warranties, guarantees, or insurance policies
Climb on roofs (creates risk to person)
Access crawl spaces if unsafe or not readily accessible
Perform load testing beyond standard testing

roof_inspection.required: Visual inspection of roof coverings, flashing, and drainage
roof_inspection.not_required: Climbing on roof, walking on roof, load testing
roof_inspection.reason: Walking on brittle/damaged roofs creates risk to person and property damage per IL law. Visual inspection from ground/ladder is sufficient.
roof_inspection.customer_question: Why didn't the inspector walk on the roof?
roof_inspection.legal_basis: Readily accessible means without risk to persons or property. Illinois law does not require inspectors to risk safety.

electrical_panel.required: Visual inspection of electrical panel and condition of wiring visible
electrical_panel.not_required: Opening main breaker, dismantling panel components, load testing
electrical_panel.reason: Opening breaker = dismantling (not allowed) + electrical shock hazard. Visual inspection only per IL law.
electrical_panel.customer_question: Why didn't the inspector open the electrical panel?
electrical_panel.legal_basis: IL law prohibits dismantling and requires inspections without risk to persons. Opening main breaker violates both rules.

water_testing.not_required: Water quality testing, pressure testing, testing on demand
water_testing.reason: Water testing is not part of visual inspection standard. Beyond scope of home inspection per IL law.
water_testing.customer_question: Why didn't you test the water quality?
water_testing.legal_basis: Home inspection = visual examination. Testing = technical/exhaustive service, not required.

electrical_outlets.required: Visual inspection and operation of representative number of outlets using normal controls
electrical_outlets.not_required: Load testing, GFCI/AFCI testing beyond visual operation, specialized testing
electrical_outlets.reason: Standard visual operation is required. Advanced testing is beyond home inspection scope.
electrical_outlets.customer_question: Why didn't you thoroughly test all outlets?
electrical_outlets.legal_basis: Home inspection uses normal operating controls only per IL law. Advanced testing = engineering service.

hvac_efficiency.required: Visual inspection and operation test of heating/cooling systems
hvac_efficiency.not_required: Efficiency rating, energy audit, performance testing, cooling capacity measurement
hvac_efficiency.reason: Efficiency testing is engineering service, not home inspection per IL law.
hvac_efficiency.customer_question: Why didn't you test the air conditioning efficiency?
hvac_efficiency.legal_basis: Home inspection = visual examination and operation. Efficiency = engineering service beyond scope.

structural_evaluation.not_required: Engineering assessment, soil evaluation, structural safety determination
structural_evaluation.reason: Structural engineering is specialized service, not home inspection per IL law.
structural_evaluation.customer_question: Is the foundation safe? Should I get a structural engineer?
structural_evaluation.legal_basis: Home inspection does not include engineering services per IL law. For safety determination, hire licensed structural engineer.

crawl_space.required: Visual inspection of accessible crawl spaces
crawl_space.not_required: Entering unsafe crawl spaces, areas with hazardous materials, unsafe conditions
crawl_space.reason: IL law specifically exempts areas that are unsafe or not readily accessible.
crawl_space.customer_question: Why didn't you inspect the crawl space?
crawl_space.legal_basis: Crawl space may be unsafe or not readily accessible. IL law does not require entering such areas.

mold_assessment.required: Visual inspection for water damage and mold presence
mold_assessment.not_required: Mold testing, mold identification, environmental assessment
mold_assessment.reason: Mold testing is environmental service, not home inspection per IL law.
mold_assessment.legal_basis: Home inspection = visual. Mold testing = environmental service beyond inspection scope.

pest_inspection.required: Visual inspection for signs of pest activity
pest_inspection.not_required: Detailed pest inspection, identification, treatment recommendations
pest_inspection.reason: Detailed pest inspection is specialized service per IL law.
pest_inspection.customer_question: Should I get a pest inspection?
pest_inspection.legal_basis: Home inspection includes visual signs only. Detailed pest inspection = specialized service.

radon_testing.required: Visual inspection of potential radon entry points
radon_testing.reason: Radon testing is environmental service, not home inspection per IL law.
radon_testing.legal_basis: Radon testing is environmental service beyond home inspection scope per IL law.

general_disclaimer: Per Illinois law, home inspection is a visual examination of readily accessible systems using normal operating controls. It does not include engineering, environmental, or specialized services. For such services, homeowners should hire licensed specialists.
